title: Gale Gand's Lunch! (gnv64)

by Gale Gand and Christie Matheson
Houghton Mifflin Harcourt | April 2014 | ISBN-10: 054422650X | ePUB | 139 pages | 16 mb

The midday meal is a fabulous opportunity to enjoy delicious ingredients and flavor-packed dishes and to slow down while you eat (even if just for a few moments). Acclaimed chef Gale Gand shows you how to make it happenÃ¢â‚¬â€simply and easily, and for a fraction of the price of prepared salads and sandwiches. Gand offers 150 recipesÃ¢â‚¬â€including plenty of kid-friendly fare (tested and approved by GandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s own children)Ã¢â‚¬â€along with tons of tips for packing foods to go or turning lunch into a celebration with friends and family. As Gand says, when it comes to entertaining, Ã¢â‚¬Å“lunch is the new dinner.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Chapters on soups, pastas, salads, grains, fruits, and more, as well as desserts, drinks, dips, and snacks, provide countless combinations for memorable meals at home or on the go.

Chef Gale Gand is a nationally acclaimed pastry chef, restaurateur, cookbook author, television personality, teacher, entrepreneur, and mother. Chef Gand has been recognized as Outstanding Pastry Chef of the Year by The James Beard Foundation and by Bon Appetite magazine.
GaleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s latest restaurant project, Spritz Burger, is a collaboration with The Hearty Boys, (Dan Smith and Steve McDonagh) who won Food NetworkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reality competition Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Next Food Network StarÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, season 1. Gale is a prolific cookbook author with eight titles to her credit. Gale also produces her own artisan root beer, Ã¢â‚¬Å“GaleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Root Beer,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ which is available nationally.
